original_title: Sri Lanka to receive total debt relief of USD 8 billion through restructuring
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has announced that the debt restructuring process will include USD 5 billion in loan interest relief from bilateral creditors and a USD 3 billion debt write-off from commercial creditors providing the country with a total relief of USD 8 billion.
Wickremesinghe revealed this while addressing the ‘Urumaya’ Freehold Land Deed Ceremony held in Kurunegala today (05), the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
